atk-s0517a11:2_1: Idāni tassa maggassa maṇḍapeyyattaṁ dassentena kathitāya bhagavato vacanekadesapubbaṅgamāya maṇḍapeyyakathāya apubbatthānuvaṇṇanā.
atk-s0517a11:2_2: Tattha maṇḍapeyyanti yathā sampannaṁ nimmalaṁ vippasannaṁ sappi sappimaṇḍoti vuccati, evaṁ vippasannaṭṭhena maṇḍo, pātabbaṭṭhena peyyaṁ.
atk-s0517a11:2_3: Yañhi pivitvā antaravīthiyaṁ patitā visaññino attano sāṭakādīnampi assāmikā honti, taṁ pasannampi na pātabbaṁ.
atk-s0517a11:2_4: Mayhaṁ pana idaṁ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṁ sāsanabrahmacariyaṁ sampannattā nimmalattā vippasannattā maṇḍañca hitasukhāvahattā peyyañcāti maṇḍapeyyanti dīpeti.
atk-s0517a11:2_5: Maṇḍo peyyo etthāti maṇḍapeyyaṁ. Kiṁ taṁ? Sāsanabrahmacariyaṁ.
atk-s0517a11:2_8: sikkhattayaṁ nibbānatthāya pavattanato brahmatthāya cariyāti brahmacariyanti vuccati.
atk-s0517a11:2_13: Bāhirakañhi bhesajjamaṇḍaṁ vejjassa asammukhā pivantānaṁ pamāṇaṁ vā uggamananiggamanaṁ vā na jānāmāti āsaṅkā hoti.
atk-s0517a11:2_14: Vejjassa sammukhā pana vejjo jānissatīti nirāsaṅkā pivanti.
atk-s0517a11:2_15: Evamevaṁ amhākañca dhammassāmī satthā sammukhībhūtoti vīriyaṁ katvā pivathāti maṇḍapāne sanniyojeti.
atk-s0517a11:3_1: Tidhattena maṇḍo tidhattamaṇḍo, tividhena maṇḍoti attho.
atk-s0517a11:3_3: Parinibbutepi pana satthari ekadesena maṇḍattayaṁ pavattatiyeva.
atk-s0517a11:3_4: Teneva cassa niddese ‘‘satthari sammukhībhūte’’ti avatvā katamo desanāmaṇḍotiādi vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0517a11:5_0: Ācikkhanāti desetabbānaṁ saccādīnaṁ imāni nāmānīti nāmavasena kathanā. Desanāti dassanā. Paññāpanāti jānāpanā, ñāṇamukhe ṭhapanā vā.
atk-s0517a11:5_1: Āsanaṁ ṭhapento hi ‘‘āsanaṁ paññāpetī’’ti vuccati. Paṭṭhapanāti paññāpanā, pavattanāti attho, ñāṇamukhe ṭhapanā vā. Vivaraṇāti vivaṭakaraṇaṁ, vivaritvā dassanāti attho. Vibhajanāti vibhāgakiriyā, vibhāgato dassanāti attho.
atk-s0517a11:5_3: Atha vā ācikkhanāti desanādīnaṁ channaṁ padānaṁ mūlapadaṁ.
atk-s0517a11:5_4: Desanādīni cha padāni tassa atthavivaraṇatthaṁ vuttāni.
atk-s0517a11:5_5: Tattha desanāti ugghaṭitaññūnaṁ vasena saṅkhepato paṭhamaṁ uddesavasena desanā.
atk-s0517a11:5_6: Ugghaṭitaññū hi saṅkhepena vuttaṁ paṭhamaṁ vuttañca paṭivijjhanti.
atk-s0517a11:5_7: Paññāpanāti vipañcitaññūnaṁ vasena tesaṁ cittatosanena buddhinisānena ca paṭhamaṁ saṅkhittassa vitthārato niddesavasena paññāpanā.
atk-s0517a11:5_8: Paṭṭhapanāti tesaṁyeva niddiṭṭhassa niddesassa paṭiniddesavasena vitthārataravacanena paññāpanā.
atk-s0517a11:5_16: Ete hi bhikkhuādayo paṭivedhavasena dhammadesanaṁ paṭiggaṇhantīti paṭiggahā.
atk-s0517a11:5_18: Ariyamaggo nibbānena saṁsandanato brahmatthāya cariyāti brahmacariyanti vuccati.
atk-s0517a11:6_1: Idāni adhimokkhamaṇḍotiādīhi tasmiṁ maggakkhaṇe vijjamānāni indriyabalabojjhaṅgamaggaṅgāni maṇḍapeyyavidhāne yojetvā dasseti.
atk-s0517a11:6_5: Saddhindriyassa adhimokkhamaṇḍaṁ pivatīti maṇḍapeyyanti saddhindriyato adhimokkhamaṇḍassa anaññattepi sati aññaṁ viya katvā vohāravasena vuccati,
atk-s0517a11:6_6: yathā loke nisadapotako nisadapotasarīrassa anaññattepi sati nisadapotassa sarīranti vuccati,
atk-s0517a11:6_7: yathā ca pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘phusitatta’’ntiādīsu dhammato anaññopi bhāvo añño viya vutto,
atk-s0517a11:6_8: yathā ca aṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘phusanalakkhaṇo phasso’’tiādīsu (dha. sa. aṭṭha.
atk-s0517a11:6_9: 1 dhammuddesavāra phassapañcamakarāsivaṇṇanā) dhammato anaññampi lakkhaṇaṁ aññaṁ viya vuttaṁ, evamidanti veditabbaṁ .
atk-s0517a11:6_11: Taṁsamaṅgipuggalo taṁ maṇḍaṁ pivatīti katvā tena puggalena so maṇḍo pātabbato maṇḍapeyyaṁ nāma hotīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0517a11:6_14: Apubbesu pana pariḷāhoti pīṇanalakkhaṇāya pītiyā paṭipakkho kilesasantāpo.
atk-s0517a11:7_1: Puna aññena pariyāyena maṇḍapeyyavidhiṁ niddisitukāmo atthi maṇḍotiādimāha.
atk-s0517a11:7_3: Attharasotiādīsu saddhindriyassa adhimuccanaṁ attho, saddhindriyaṁ dhammo,
atk-s0517a11:7_10: vimuttipaṭilābharati vimuttiraso. Ratīti ca taṁsampayuttā, tadārammaṇā vā pīti.
atk-s0517a11:7_12: Imasmiṁ pariyāye maṇḍassa peyyaṁ maṇḍapeyyanti attho vutto hoti.
atk-s0517a11:8_0: Evaṁ indriyādibodhipakkhiyadhammapaṭipāṭiyā indriyabalabojjhaṅgamaggaṅgānaṁ vasena maṇḍapeyyaṁ dassetvā puna ante ṭhitaṁ brahmacariyamaṇḍaṁ dassento maggassa padhānattā maggaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ katvā uppaṭipāṭivasena maggaṅgabojjhaṅgabalaindriyāni dassesi .
atk-s0517a11:8_1: Ādhipateyyaṭṭhena indriyā maṇḍotiādayo yathāyogaṁ lokiyalokuttarā maṇḍā.
atk-s0517a11:8_3: Tathaṭṭhena saccā maṇḍoti ettha pana dukkhasamudayānaṁ maṇḍattābhāvā mahāhatthipadasutte (ma. ni.
